name: Air Hockey
description: Online PvP Air Hockey with fast-paced gameplay! Overcome your opponent by using madskillz and powerful pickups.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Duo-core Intel or AMD, 2 GHz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce8600 GT 256MB / ATI(AMD)Radeon X1950 256MB DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 512 MB available space
